# stthirdparty.createOrReplaceTempView("stthirdparty")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
rpttriplevel
AS
SELECT

 tms_trip_id tripid
,tms_trip_thirdpartyid thirdpartyid
,coalesce(tms_thirdparty_name,'CITY LINEHAUL') thirdpartyname
,concat_ws(',',tms_lmsbookingweights_bookingid) bookingids
,concat_ws(',',tms_lmsbookingweights_loadid) loadids

,sum(tms_lmsbookingweights_noofparcels) noofparcels
,sum(tms_lmsbookingweights_weight) weight
,sum(tms_lmsbookingweights_chargeweight) chargeweight
,sum(tms_lmsbookingweights_volweight) volweight
,sum(tms_lmsbookingweights_volumiserweight) volumiserweight
,max(orv_dispatch_startdate) dispatchstartdate
,max(lms_loadchild_ldate) loadclosedate
,max(coalesce(orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexitapp,orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexit)) exitdepotgeofence
,sum(lms_loadchild_effectiveloaddurationminutes) effectiveloaddurationminutes
,sum(lms_loadchild_effectiveoffloaddurationminutes) effectiveoffloaddurationminutes
FROM sttrip t
LEFT JOIN stthirdparty on tms_trip_thirdpartyid = tms_thirdparty_id
LEFT JOIN stlmsbookingweights l on l.tms_lmsbookingweights_tripid = t.tms_trip_id
LEFT JOIN stloadchild lc on lc.lms_loadchild_id = l.tms_lmsbookingweights_loadid

WHERE tms_trip_startdate >= to_timestamp(year(current_date())-1||'-'||(month(current_date()))||'-'||'01')


GROUP BY
     tms_trip_id
    ,tms_trip_thirdpartyid
    ,tms_thirdparty_name
    ,concat_ws(',',tms_lmsbookingweights_bookingid)
    ,concat_ws(',',tms_lmsbookingweights_loadid)
    ,orv_dispatch_startdate
    ,coalesce(orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexitapp,orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexit)
